Text:
Lumion® is a real-time 3D architectural visualization tool for architects, urban planners and designers.
It’s perfectly suited for creating videos, still renderings and live demonstrations with a quick turnaround.
Lumion offers excellent graphics in combination with a fast and efficient workflow, saving you time, effort and money.
It is in fact so easy to create awesome still renderings and videos with Lumion® that it almost feels like cheating.....

Minimum system requirements
 OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7 (32- or 64-bit) and DirectX 9.0c or later
 System memory: 3GB (for simple scenes)
 Graphics card: NVidia GeForce 9800 GTX or similar ATI/AMD, with at least 1GB memory

Recommended system requirements
 OS: Windows 7 64-bit
 System memory: At least 6GB
 Graphics card: NVidia 460GTX / ATI 5850 or faster, with at least 1GB memory

How To CRACK

1.- Create “C:ProgramDataLumion 2” folder
 2.- Copy myLumion.ppp into folder created
 3.- Apply the patcher with admin rights.
 4.- Edit Host file & add
 127.0.0.1 backup.lumion3d.com
 127.0.0.1 activate.lumion.com
 Save & close.

Kako krekati :

1 - Skinuti Free Lumion 2.5 sa oficijalne stranice.
1/5 - Instalirajte ga.
2 - Napraviti folder ako ne postoji “C:ProgramDataLumion 2” folder.
3 - Kopirati "myLumion.ppp" u folder koji ste napravili.
4 - Ako imate 32bit-a sustav onda pokrenite lp25p32Final.exe
    za 64bit-a je lp25p64Final.exe.
5 - Otvorite "hosts" fajl(nalazi se : C:WindowsSystem32driversetc)
    i u njega upišite slijedece :
    127.0.0.1 backup.lumion3d.com
    127.0.0.1 activate.lumion.com
    na kraju sacuvajte i zatvorite.

    Vas Lumion 2.5 je sada Professional.

Ok,

1.Find in your windows 7 C:ProgramData
2.Create "Lumion 2" folder
3.Copy myLumion.ppp in Lumion 2 folder
4.Apply the patch with admin rights.(Right click "run with admin rights"
5.Go to C:WindowsSystem32driversetc and find file named "hosts".Right click on file and open with "notepad"

YOU SEE SOMTHING LIKE THIS :

# Copyright (c) 1993-2009 Microsoft Corp.
#
# This is a sample HOSTS file used by Microsoft TCP/IP for Windows.
#
# This file contains the mappings of IP addresses to host names. Each
# entry should be kept on an individual line. The IP address should
# be placed in the first column followed by the corresponding host name.
# The IP address and the host name should be separated by at least one
# space.
#
# Additionally, comments (such as these) may be inserted on individual
# lines or following the machine name denoted by a '#' symbol.
#
# For example:
#
#      102.54.94.97     rhino.acme.com          # source server
#       38.25.63.10     x.acme.com              # x client host

# localhost name resolution is handled within DNS itself.
#	127.0.0.1       localhost
#	::1             localhost

6.On the end of this file copy :
127.0.0.1 backup.lumion3d.com
 127.0.0.1 activate.lumion.com
 Save & close.

Start Lumion and your Lumion its Professional.
